title: Ultimate Skin Idea
body:
So last night I was playing Sion when I had a thought, 'Why not give him some clothes?' then it got me thinking about champions skins and I came up with a pretty solid idea.

So Instead of having a skin that evolves per level like Pulsefire Ezreal, it would be pretty cool if there was a skin that allowed a champion to change it's appearance based on stats acquired, for example; if my armour stat exceeded say 150 then my champion would be seen wearing some heavier cooler armour, if my Attack Damage stat exceeded say 200 then your champion equipped a bigger/cooler weapon, if you attack speed exceeded 1.5 or so your champion starts dual wielding or something. 

Just a thought, I feel like it could be popular if it wasn't too farfetched.
